title: About Us
bodyHtml:
We started Girls Travel because of the unique challenges we face as women travelers. Safety is of the utmost importance when arriving to a new city or country you're unfamiliar with. The pressure of planning a trip from thousands of miles away can turn your adventure of a lifetime into a pool of frustration. Even the procress of figuring out what to pack has the potential to become overwhelming at times. We knew there had to be a better way.

That's why we created a community of female world travelers with the mission of encouraging autonomy and fostering connection. Have a question on the best places to stay while visiting Costa Rica? Say yourself hours of searching and reach out to your fellow travelers. With a community who value meaningful experiences at your fingertips, an answer is never our of reach. Read a personal account of your favorite influencer's journey through France by checking out our articles.

We want to be the #1 source of travel inspiration and value for women around the world. Our aspirations are large because we truly believe in the support and value we can provide to you when planning your next adventure. We have a lot of features that we plan to roll out in the coming months and will be actively developing this platform as to continue adding value to our community. We encourage you to join the journey and experience more on your next trip.
